about_the_game:
Extremely beautiful girls want to play with you and your... brain. Can you satisfy them?

Enjoy the girls. Match the cards. They want to dance for you. Dozens of cards will show you what you want to see. We both know what that is. Some naked girls!
Click on them and remember what you saw. A blondie? A brunette? Match them and you will succeed.

If you beat the game you get a very nice... and cool... surprise.

Gorgeous, colorful, wet and warm 3d graphics. An amazing soundtrack made of moans of pleasure. And tons of girls who wanna make you come... back for more.

content_descriptors.notes: There is lots of naked girls dancing.
